Reviews.Title: Great Firefox OS phone!
Reviews.Author: niu tech
Reviews.Content: Alcatel One Touch Fire - brand new smartphone with Firefox OS (Orange) is a great phone for regular users. It has a large 3.5" screen, a single flat button below, a 3.2MP camera on a back and edges in one of three colors. It is based on innovative Firefox OS from Mozilla, with all apps made in HTML5. Phone's interface is really intuitive and easy to use. You can quickly search for any topic using contextual search and choose from plenty of HTML5 apps in Mozilla Marketplace. You can browse the web through WiFi using fast and safe Firefox Mobile browser. You can track your position using built-in A-GPS receiver and listen to the FM radio. This makes it a perfect low-cost phone for everyone!

ProductInfo.Features:
Featuring Firefox OS by Mozilla
Lots of powerful HTML5 apps
Super easy user interface
Colorful 3.5" HVGA screen
Beautiful design
ProductInfo.Name: Alcatel One Touch Fire - brand new smartphone with Firefox OS (Orange)
